job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T22:31:10.000Z", "description": "Our Opportunity

The ideal candidate will be a well-rounded technologist with a passion for building innovative business

solutions with big data and Java technologies. Experience delivering big data solutions \u2013 from system

setup to development to business solution delivery \u2013 is critical. Programming experience is also

paramount. Senior Data Engineer should be keeping up with the latest developments and should be

able to connect technical capability with business need.

What You'll Do

\uf0b7

Design analytic solutions for business users that provide the data needed to operate the

business

\uf0b7

Build data integration solutions that process mid-large volume transactions in real time and in

batch using big data and Java technologies

\uf0b7

You will be responsible for design, development, delivery and support of large-scale, data flows

and tools.

\uf0b7

What You'll Need

\uf0b7

BS in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or Information Technology

\uf0b7

5 \u2013 6 years of experience working with data warehouses (Vertica preferred)

\uf0b7

5 \u2013 6 years of experience writing software in any of the following programming language (Java,

Python)

\uf0b7

Experience performing analytics to solve complex business problems

\uf0b7

4 - 5 years of experience integrating data between operational databases using data

integration tools like AWS ETL technologies (preferred), Informatica, Datastage or SSIS.

\uf0b7

Expert level knowledge of data integration and familiarity with common data integration

challenges like converting data types, handling errors, and translating between different

technology stacks

\uf0b7

SQL expertise and the ability to work with many different database types including Postgres,

SQL Server, And Others As Required

\uf0b7

Able to work independently, own the requirements and deliverables, and produce an ETL

solution end to end successfully

\uf0b7

Able to work in a fast-paced environment and be comfortable being accountable for work

products

Bonus

\uf0b7

Experience designing analytic solutions in Vertica

\uf0b7

Experience with AWS

\uf0b7

Java front and backend

\uf0b7

Experience in ecommerce or large volume transactional systems

\uf0b7

Experience with statistical methods and operations research techniques such as linear

programming

If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, or you require a

religious accommodation, and you wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for

employment at our company, please contact HR@

Chewy.com
